summary: Irish republican Bobby Sands leads the inmates of a Northern Irish prison in a hunger strike.
cast: Stuart Graham|Laine Megaw|Brian Milligan|Liam McMahon|Karen Hassan|Michael Fassbender|Frank McCusker|Lalor Roddy|Helen Madden|Des McAleer|Geoff Gatt|Rory Mullen|Ben Peel|Helena Bereen|Paddy Jenkins|Liam Cunningham|Billy Clarke|Ciaran Flynn|B.J. Hogg|Neal Hughes|Larry Cowan|Tom Dart|Denis Halligan|Thomas James Scott|Margaret Thatcher
title: Hunger
